overview: Phanya’s pull-ups in the park attract Sodsai’s attention. Having his bicep squeezed, Phanya inquires as to whether Sodsai would like to get groped back. Well, of course he would, but not there and proves it. Does country-stud, Rapeepak, have any money? Parnsiri doubts it, but while showing him a room he’s enthusiastically mauled mid-sentence. Hot for each other the two take turns deeply exploring private regions. Then Anutin checks out the high-rise view with Khanaen but can’t keep his hands of a super ass. Well, what’s a guy to do so in front of the city lights he sucks his buddy’s dick and, oh well, you know, screw the lights, for a really illuminating experience it’s into bed. These guys make sure they find ALL THE RIGHT PLACES!
title: All the Right Places
